package JavaTutorial;

public class JavaTutorial_swap_without_temp {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub

		
		int firstnumber=1;
		int secondnumber=2;
		int thirdnumber=3;
		
		System.out.println("Before Swapping");
		System.out.println("firstnumber: " + firstnumber + " secondnumber: " + secondnumber +" thirdnumber: "+ thirdnumber +"");
		
		System.out.println("After Swapping");
		System.out.println("firstnumber: " + secondnumber + " secondnumber: " + thirdnumber +" thirdnumber: "+ firstnumber +"");
		
	}

}
